Reviews.Title: “Do not rent here!!! Worst experience ever!!!!”

Reviews.Content: expect harassment management reason foreign couple runs inn rude terrible communication manager calls checkin demands payment additional people staying wife whatever crazy reason believes throw massive sleepover party money telling we’re calls security police station expected security guy comes course people couple abruptly conversation husband start saying money money accompanied gimme money hand gesture tried talk annoyance wife jump chanting run front desk surreal episode seinfeld bathroom tiny literally 68 inches space front toilet sit normally manager’s wife cleaning cheap hire staff explains it’s clean bottom line rent wouldn’t stay free horrible experience hope save mess
